name: draw_once
attributes: # [doc = " ガチャを引いてアイテムを取得するが、"]
# [doc = " gacha_account.owner と ctx.accounts.user.key() の照合チェックがない"]
body: let gacha = & mut ctx . accounts . gacha_account ;
let cost = ctx . accounts . config . pull_cost ;
let drop_id = ctx . accounts . config . next_drop ;
gacha . pulls = gacha . pulls . checked_add (1) . unwrap () ;
* * ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () -= cost ;
* * ctx . accounts . pool . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () += cost ;

fields.name: gacha_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] を付与して所有者照合を行うべき"]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ガチャコスト支払い元のユーザー（署名者）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: pool
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ガチャコスト受取用プールアカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: config
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ガチャ設定（コスト・次ドロップID）を保持するアカウント"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来このガチャを回せるユーザーの Pubkey"]

fields.name: pulls
fields.attribute: # [doc = " これまでに引いた回数"]

fields.name: last_drop
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 最後に出たドロップの ID"]

fields.name: pull_cost
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ガチャ 1 回あたりのコスト（Lamports）"]

fields.name: next_drop
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 次に出現するドロップの固定 ID"]
